subject: Math
tips: 📚 Break study into smaller, manageable sessions. Focus on one concept at a time to avoid feeling overwhelmed.
💡 Take regular breaks to keep your mind fresh. A short walk or a quick stretch can help you refocus.
📝 Use active recall and spaced repetition. Regularly test yourself on key concepts to ensure you're retaining the material.
🔍 Visualize problems and solutions. Use graphs and diagrams to better understand calculus concepts.
🌟 Stay organized and plan ahead. Set specific goals for each study session to track your progress and stay motivated.
